Description: Road is used as a bypass from Mundaring to Welshpool road & vice versa There is heavy haulage trucks using the road regularly even though it is a 3 km stretch of narrow winding road with no footpath. Cyclists constantly use this section riding in packs & we have been driven off the road on more than one occasion. The weekends are busy & noisy with motorbikes in packs causing a constant battle with cars, cyclists , motorbikes & pedestrians. Locals find it difficult to walk along the road
